chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: LORD, remember David, and all his afflictions:
items.plainText: LORD, remember David, and all his afflictions:

items.text: How he sware unto the LORD, and vowed unto the mighty God of Jacob;
items.plainText: How he sware unto the LORD, and vowed unto the mighty God of Jacob;

items.text: Surely I will not come into the tabernacle of my house, nor go up into my bed;
items.plainText: Surely I will not come into the tabernacle of my house, nor go up into my bed;

items.text: I will not give sleep to mine eyes, or slumber to mine eyelids,
items.plainText: I will not give sleep to mine eyes, or slumber to mine eyelids,

items.text: Until I find out a place for the LORD, an habitation for the mighty God of Jacob.
items.plainText: Until I find out a place for the LORD, an habitation for the mighty God of Jacob.

items.text: Lo, we heard of it at Ephratah: we found it in the fields of the wood.
items.plainText: Lo, we heard of it at Ephratah: we found it in the fields of the wood.

items.text: We will go into his tabernacles: we will worship at his footstool.
items.plainText: We will go into his tabernacles: we will worship at his footstool.

items.text: Arise, O LORD, into thy rest; thou, and the ark of thy strength.
items.plainText: Arise, O LORD, into thy rest; thou, and the ark of thy strength.

items.text: Let thy priests be clothed with righteousness; and let thy saints shout for joy.
items.plainText: Let thy priests be clothed with righteousness; and let thy saints shout for joy.

items.text: For thy servant David's sake turn not away the face of thine anointed.
items.plainText: For thy servant David's sake turn not away the face of thine anointed.

items.text: The LORD hath sworn in truth unto David; he will not turn from it; Of the fruit of thy body will I set upon thy throne.
items.plainText: The LORD hath sworn in truth unto David; he will not turn from it; Of the fruit of thy body will I set upon thy throne.

items.text: If thy children will keep my covenant and my testimony that I shall teach them, their children shall also sit upon thy throne for evermore.
items.plainText: If thy children will keep my covenant and my testimony that I shall teach them, their children shall also sit upon thy throne for evermore.

items.text: For the LORD hath chosen Zion; he hath desired it for his habitation.
items.plainText: For the LORD hath chosen Zion; he hath desired it for his habitation.

items.text: This is my rest for ever: here will I dwell; for I have desired it.
items.plainText: This is my rest for ever: here will I dwell; for I have desired it.

items.text: I will abundantly bless her provision: I will satisfy her poor with bread.
items.plainText: I will abundantly bless her provision: I will satisfy her poor with bread.

items.text: I will also clothe her priests with salvation: and her saints shall shout aloud for joy.
items.plainText: I will also clothe her priests with salvation: and her saints shall shout aloud for joy.

items.text: There will I make the horn of David to bud: I have ordained a lamp for mine anointed.
items.plainText: There will I make the horn of David to bud: I have ordained a lamp for mine anointed.

items.text: His enemies will I clothe with shame: but upon himself shall his crown flourish.
items.plainText: His enemies will I clothe with shame: but upon himself shall his crown flourish.
